name: STIBO SYSTEMS INTEGRATION
headline: Manage and Synchronize your product catalog with VTEX Ecommerce through Stibo Systems MDM solution.
overview: Want to optimize your e-commerce catalogue? Then you need a Master data Management focused solution, such as Stibo Systems.\n\n Integrate STIBO SYSTEMS STEP Product Catalog with VTEX Ecommerce, all the STEP MDM Features working to Publish the best data to VTEX.
features: Synchronize your Product Catalog in the Channel VTEX Ecommerce
Improve your internal processes and Time to Market by joining STIBO and VTEX
Manage and update in a controlled way the information published in the Ecommerce
Synchronize all the characteristics of your product catalog with VTEX (Data and Assets)
